This is a simple & easy financial android application.

[ConceptOfDailyMoney Concept of daily-money]

=Features=
 * Record your daily expense, income, asset and liability.
 * Show balance of money.
 * Export/Import to CSV
 * Money balance

=Todo=
 * Chart
